definitions.text: (Judeo-Christian and Islamic religions) chief spirit of evil and adversary of God; tempter of mankind; master of Hell
a word used in exclamations of confusion
a rowdy or mischievous person (usually a young man)
examples: he chased the young hellions out of his yard

definitions.text: a cruel wicked and inhuman person
cause annoyance in; disturb, especially by minor irritations
examples: Mosquitoes buzzing in my ear really bothers me
It irritates me that she never closes the door after she leaves

definitions.text: coat or stuff with a spicy paste
